alert.note: Alert for Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 4:59PM CDT until June 06 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 359 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Merriman, or 18 miles east of Gordon, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Medicine Lake, Highway 61 crossing the Snake River, Highway 61 Crossing The Niobrara River, Intersection of Highway 61 and Shadbolt Road, Indian Hill, Schoolhouse Lake and Intersection of Highway 20 and Irwin Road. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 118 and 133. Highway 61 between mile markers 192 and 224. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
